title: How men continually produce sperm -- and how that discovery could help treat infertility

title_detail.value: How men continually produce sperm -- and how that discovery could help treat infertility

summary: Using a leading-edge technique, researchers defined the cell types in both newborn and adult human testes and identified biomarkers for spermatogonial stem cells, opening a path for new strategies to treat male infertility.

summary_detail.value: Using a leading-edge technique, researchers defined the cell types in both newborn and adult human testes and identified biomarkers for spermatogonial stem cells, opening a path for new strategies to treat male infertility.
